title: Who else has their copy of Breath of the Wild?
body:
Went and got mine this morning.  Hubby took off work and I stupidly went with my twisted ankle I injured yesterday cause I'm a complete klutz but had to go too =P

Only Gamestop still had copies and even then they only had like 5 copies left for WiiU.  Switch was completely sold out everywhere along with most of the copies of Zelda for it.  Basically night and day compared to WiiU release lol

1 hour and 42 minutes left for installation....who else has their copy?  At least I have an excuse to sit on the couch all day :^)
